title: TextView One parameter
content: .myTextView > div { display: inline-block; width: 25%; vertical-align: top; height: 100%; }
.myTextView .name { margin-left: 10px; background-color: #a9b3bc; color: black; font-weight: bolder; width: 85%; display: inline-block; margin-top: 5px;text-align: center;}
.myTextView .value { margin-left: 10px; background-color: black; color: #00ff00; font-weight: bold;  width: 85%; display: inline-block; text-align: left; padding: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; }
